p: Pollination stage of HD3086 showed maximum MAPK activity (1.55 U/mg proteins) under T 1, and minimum under T 2 (0.35 U/mg proteins; Fig. 6b). Similarly, grain-filling showed maximum MAPK activity under T 2 treatment (3.1 U/mg proteins). BT-Schomburgk during pollination stage showed maximum MAPK activity under ambient control condition (3.9 U/mg proteins) ( Fig. 6b). During grain-filling, the maximum MAPK activity was observed in response to T 2 (6.1 U/mg proteins).
